posts.title: A happy time
posts.content: In my childhood I would laugh and play.
posts.author: Hornsby Sumpin

posts.title: Better days
posts.content: Pals are a necessity in this lonely world.
posts.author: Baffle McCough

comments.content: What a baleful load of beeswax.
comments.author: Gluglug Baldag

posts.title: True madness
posts.content:
Let us begin again, as we were when we were babies.

Further and further from the truth we could never travel.

comments.content: I am comforted by our debate.
comments.author: Mildrand Brumpup
